step: Click on the four colored squares at the top left of the screen. This will toke you to the Work Flow Guide screen.
Select Preventative Action if it is not already selected.
Click Reagent Preparing tab and click Reagernt Lood List to print list of consumables and reagents required for another 24 hours of operation.
Before pulling reagents, consult Reagent tab for status of reagents onboard.
